column2:
"Current measurement mode
is set to 20 Second Tally.
Please select a mode."

"Current measurement mode
is set to Free Mode.
Please select a mode."

"Tally mode set.
Measures the damage you can
deal in 20 seconds, 5 times."

"Free mode set.
There is no time limit, so return to the
Campship when you want to finish."

"Current measurement mode
is set to 20 Second Tally.
Only the party leader can change modes."

"Current measurement mode
is set to Free Mode.
Only the party leader can change modes."

"Measurement is complete.
Thank you for your hard work."
